thread.title: Anthony Weiner live-tweets Benghazi hearing, drops F-bomb
thread.title_full: Anthony Weiner live-tweets Benghazi hearing, drops F-bomb - POLITICO

author: Michael Hirsh
title: Anthony Weiner live-tweets Benghazi hearing, drops F-bomb
text:
Former New York congressman Anthony Weiner watched Hillary Clinton's testimony before the congressional committee investigating the attacks in Benghazi — and live-tweeted his thoughts throughout the day. The congressman famous for sending racy photos in direct messages over Twitter took a snarky tone in critiquing some of the questions by Republicans on the committee:
Is it a given that 5 times more security in Benghazi would not have resulted in 5 times more loss of life of Americans?
— Anthony Weiner (@anthonyweiner) October 22, 2015 For reference, they usually reserve the big issues at a hearing for the chairman. Gowdy is doing Blumenthal emails. Wow.
— Anthony Weiner (@anthonyweiner) October 22, 2015
The frequency of Weiner's tweets varied throughout the day. He took a break for a few hours before tweeting again.
Parts of this hearing are actually interesting. Being Secretary of State is F'ing difficult.
— Anthony Weiner (@anthonyweiner) October 22, 2015 And at one point Weiner weighed in while Rep. Peter Roskam was questioning Clinton:
Oh this is rich. A Congressman critiquing someone else's press clips.
— Anthony Weiner (@anthonyweiner) October 22, 2015 Roskam's questions are clearly about getting answers for the families of the slain Americans. Thanks.
— Anthony Weiner (@anthonyweiner) October 22, 2015
Weiner is the husband of Huma Abedin, a longtime top Clinton aide.
